org.apache.polygene.bootstrap

Interface ConfigurationDeclaration


  • public interface ConfigurationDeclaration
    Fluent API for declaring configurations. Instances of this API are acquired by calling ModuleAssembly.configurations(Class[]).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ConfigurationDeclaration setMetaInfo(Object info)
      Set additional metainfo for this configuration declaration.
      ConfigurationDeclaration visibleIn(Visibility visibility)
      Set visibility for declared entities.
      ConfigurationDeclaration withConcerns(Class<?>... concerns)
      Declare additional concerns for these configurations.
      ConfigurationDeclaration withMixins(Class<?>... mixins)
      Declare additional mixins for these configurations.
      ConfigurationDeclaration withSideEffects(Class<?>... sideEffects)
      Declare additional side-effects for these configurations.
      ConfigurationDeclaration withTypes(Class<?>... types)
      Declare additional interfaces for these declared interfaces.

    • Method Detail

      • setMetaInfo

        ConfigurationDeclaration setMetaInfo(Object info)
        Set additional metainfo for this configuration declaration.
        Parameters:
        info - metainfo that can be retrieved from the CompositeDescriptor.
        Returns:
        This instance for a fluid DSL

      • visibleIn

        ConfigurationDeclaration visibleIn(Visibility visibility)
        Set visibility for declared entities.
        Parameters:
        visibility - The Visibility that this ConfigurationComposite will have.
        Returns:
        This instance for a fluid DSL

      • withConcerns

        ConfigurationDeclaration withConcerns(Class<?>... concerns)
        Declare additional concerns for these configurations.
        Parameters:
        concerns - The concerns that are to be added to the ConfigurationComposite beyond the statically declared ones.
        Returns:
        This instance for a fluid DSL

      • withSideEffects

        ConfigurationDeclaration withSideEffects(Class<?>... sideEffects)
        Declare additional side-effects for these configurations.
        Parameters:
        sideEffects - The sideeffects that are to be added to the ConfigurationComposite beyond the statically declared ones.
        Returns:
        This instance for a fluid DSL

      • withMixins

        ConfigurationDeclaration withMixins(Class<?>... mixins)
        Declare additional mixins for these configurations.

        This can be useful to override any default mixins from the configuration interface.

        Parameters:
        mixins - The mixins that are to be added to the ConfigurationComposite beyond the statically declared ones.
        Returns:
        This instance for a fluid DSL

      • withTypes

        ConfigurationDeclaration withTypes(Class<?>... types)
        Declare additional interfaces for these declared interfaces.

        This can be useful to add types that the Configuration should implement, but which you do not want to include in the entity interface itself.

        Parameters:
        types - list of interfaces to add
        Returns:
        This instance for a fluid DSL
